wakes.gui.title: Wakes config
wakes.gui.colorIntervalSlider.title: Color Interval Slider
wakes.gui.colorIntervalSlider.infoText:
- [Left Click] on a section to edit its color
- [Left Drag] a separator to change the extend of that section
- [Shift + Left Click] on a section to insert a new separator
- [Shift + Left Click] on a separator to remove it
wakes.midnightconfig.title: Wakes config
wakes.midnightconfig.firstPersonSplashPl: Should the player's splash plane be seen while in first person?
wakes.midnightconfig.wakeResolution.tool: The pixel resolution of the wakes. Good for adjusting the wakes to better visually fit some resource packs.
wakes.midnightconfig.shaderLightPassthro: Used to fine tune the appearance of wakes when using shaders. A higher value yields brighter wakes.
wakes.midnightconfig.pickBoat.tooltip: Enables you to quickly grab a boat when middle clicking water. (Just like pick block)
wakes.midnightconfig.boatSpawning.toolti: What effect should be visible when a boat moves in water?
wakes.midnightconfig.playerSpawning.tool: What effect should be visible when you move in water?
wakes.midnightconfig.otherPlayersSpawnin: What effect should be visible when other players moves in water?
wakes.midnightconfig.mobSpawning.tooltip: What effect should be visible when mobs moves in water?
wakes.midnightconfig.itemSpawning.toolti: What effect should be visible when an item moves in water?
wakes.midnightconfig.wavePropagationFact: The impact a pixels has on its neighboring pixels inside the wakes
wakes.midnightconfig.waveDecayFactor.too: Specifies how much of a pixels value is left after each tick. (Logarithmic scale)
wakes.midnightconfig.initialStrength.too: The strength a source starts with to produce a wake.
